description: DragonFrontDb is a .NET database for data from Dragon Front
releaseNotes:
Prep for March 14th game update. Delirium faction added to enum (no cards yet).
      Existing card changes:
      ·   Canopy Goliath – END OF TURN: If this unit is in Ally Territory, gain +1/+1.
      o   Formerly START OF TURN

      ·   Netherworld Guardian – SPAWN: HUSH all non-Champion enemy units in this lane.
      o   Formerly HUSHed all units including Champions

      ·   Terrene Menders – SHIFT. END OF TURN: HEAL ally units 1 in this lane.
      o   Formerly did not include SHIFT

      ·   Divebomb Griffin – FLIGHT. This unit has +2 Power versus the enemy Stronghold.
      o   Formerly had +2 Power against non-flight units as well.

      ·   Esoteric Rebuttal – Damage the enemy Stronghold equal to the Mana Fragments of the last ally unit killed this turn. This spell's cost is equal to the unit's Mana Fragments.
      o   Formerly damaged the enemy stronghold equal to the mana fragments received during the turn. The spell’s cost was also equal to the damage done.
      
      ·   Listening Post – TRAP: Gain a copy of a random card from the opponent’s deck.
      o   Formerly: TRAP: Owner of this fort: DRAW 1.

      ·   Mystic Array - cost reduced to 4
      o   Formerly cost 5

      ·   Grave Touch – cost increased to 3.
      o   Formerly cost 2

      ·   Crosswinds – cost increased to 4.
      o   Formerly cost 3

      ·   Soul Foundry – card's cost decreased to 2.
      o   Formerly cost 3
title: DragonFrontDb
